"Your Mag":
"Your Mag is a reliable little buddy that supports you in your ARKS activities.

For instance, its \"Active Sonar\" feature helps you detect undiscovered Cocoons and Towers.

You can show or hide your Mag by opening the Main Menu with , selecting \"Equipment/Palette\", then selecting \"Mag Display Settings\"."

"In the \"Mag Form Settings\" menu, you can use special devices to change the appearance of your Mag.

Use the \"Change Mag Form\" button to switch to a registered Form. Use the \"Register New Form\" button to use a Mag Form item to register a new Form for your Mag.
If you have an N-Mag Color Sync Device, you can use \"Mag Color Settings\" to change your Mag's color."

"You can further extend the functionality of Active Sonar by using the \"Active Sonar Settings\" button under \"Sonar Support Settings\" to set an Active Sonar target.

When Active Sonar detection is enabled, the positions of nearby undiscovered objects will be indicated by the direction and frequency of the Mag's scanning sweep."
